description: ff. 129. 180 x 133; 140 x 100 mm. 17 lin. Dhū al-Qaʻdah 876. Commentary on the work of Ibn al-Hāʼim, completed 18 Rabīʻ I. 856: Brockelmann, GAL, II, 154 (4a); S II, 155. Incip.: ... ىقول ... وبعد فهذا تعلىق مختصر جعلته شرحا على الفصول المهمة
author: Sibṭ al-Māridīnī, Badr al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad, b. 1423
title: Sharḥ al-Fuṣūl al-muhimmah
creator: Sibṭ al-Māridīnī, Badr al-Dīn Muḥammad ibn Muḥammad, b. 1423
subject: Ibn al-Hāʼim, Aḥmad ibn Muḥammad, d. 1412—Fuṣūl al-muhimmah fī mawārīth al-ummah
